issue.title: Mac mIni M4 chip Fatal crash during initial chain download
issue.body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current behaviour

Fatal crash at block height=204907 when intalling bitcoin-core on new mac

### Expected behaviour

download whole chain.

### Steps to reproduce

tried it several times and it keeps crashing.
also tried earlier versions of bitcoin core.

Non techie so please forgive if I am a Numpty!
